attributes.action: Raise the Age for Taking A Driving Test To 20 Years Of Age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We could increase the age for taking a driving test to 20, this would not only give a fewer amount of cars on the road, but also reduce the amount of accidents by  young drivers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
